definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ps 68:5 a venomous serpent, perh. cobra ([[פתן]] Sir 39:30; Aram. [[פִּתְנָא]], patono, whence perh. Ar. ba3anun;—only poet.: pl. [[פְּתָנִיס ראׂשׁ]] De 32:33 (‖[[תַּנִּינִס]]), Job 20:16, ´[[מְרוֹרַת פ]] v:Job 20:14; sg. [[פֶּ֫תֶן]] Ps 91:13 (‖ [[תַּנִּין ]]), [[חֵרֵשׁ]] ´[[פ]] 58:5, [[חֻר פָָּתֶן]] Is 11:8.
